name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Interoperability Engineer with 8 years of experience in building and maintaining seamless integrations within healthcare systems and financial platforms. Proficient in critical skills such as **HL7**, **FHIR**, **Java**, **Python**, **Spring Boot**, and developing **RESTful APIs**. I possess extensive hands-on experience with **Apache Camel**, **Mirth Connect**, and **Kafka** for data streaming and transformation.

Skilled in utilizing **CI/CD** tools such as **Jenkins** and **GitLab CI/CD** with cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** to deliver high-quality software rapidly. My tech stack also involves containerization and orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring robust and scalable application deployment.

I have a strong background in managing databases with both **SQL** and **NoSQL**, and I leverage **S3** for storage solutions. With proven capabilities in monitoring and logging through **ELK Stack**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana**, I ensure system reliability and performance. My experience includes architecting solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and developing effective machine learning pipelines, making me a versatile asset for any organization.
